package.name: gcc63
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build SED=sed export SED export EXTRA_CFLAGS=-Wno-error export EXTRA_CXXFLAGS=-Wno-error if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] && which distcc ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr/local/${PKGNAME} \ --enable-shared \ --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit \ --enable-clocale=gnu --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --disable-multilib --with-system-zlib --program-suffix=63 --disable-bootstrap if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then make -j $jobcount else make -j 4 fi
